net.viktorc.detroid.framework.tuning

Interface TunableEngine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UCIEngine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Detroid

    public interface TunableEngine
extends UCIEngine
    An interface for a tunable chess engine whose parameters can be retrieved.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EngineParameters getParameters()
      Returns the parameters which are used by the engine to control search, evaluation, and other aspects of game play.
      void notifyParametersChanged()
      Notifies the engine that the parameters have changed and that if it uses cached values, it should reload them.
      void setStaticEvalTuningMode(boolean on)
      Sets whether the engine should run in static evaluation mode.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.viktorc.detroid.framework.uci.UCIEngine

        getAuthor, getDebugInfo, getHashLoadPermill, getName, getOptions, getSearchInfo, init, isInit, newGame, play, ponderHit, quit, search, setDebugMode, setOption, setPosition, stop

    • Method Detail

      • getParameters

        EngineParameters getParameters()
        Returns the parameters which are used by the engine to control search, evaluation, and other aspects of game play.
        Returns:
        The engine parameters.

      • notifyParametersChanged

        void notifyParametersChanged()
        Notifies the engine that the parameters have changed and that if it uses cached values, it should reload them.

      • setStaticEvalTuningMode

        void setStaticEvalTuningMode(boolean on)
        Sets whether the engine should run in static evaluation mode. Static evaluation mode should support 0-depth search which is a deterministic quiescent search.
        Parameters:
        on - Whether the engine should run in static evaluation mode.
